Package com.crs.dao

Interface ICarLeaseRepository

public interface ICarLeaseRepository
The ICarLeaseRepository interface defines methods for managing cars, customers, leases, and payments in a car rental system.

  • Method Details

    • addCar

      void addCar(com.crs.entity.Car car) throws com.crs.exception.CarAlreadyExistsException
      Adds a new car to the repository.
      Parameters:
      car - The car to be added.
      Throws:
      com.crs.exception.CarAlreadyExistsException - If a car with the same ID already exists in the repository.

    • removeCar

      void removeCar(int carID)
      Removes a car from the repository based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      carID - The ID of the car to be removed.

    • listAvailableCars

    • findCarById

      com.crs.entity.Car findCarById(int carID) throws com.crs.exception.CarNotFoundException
      Finds and returns a car based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      carID - The ID of the car to find.
      Returns:
      The found car.
      Throws:
      com.crs.exception.CarNotFoundException - If the specified car ID is not found in the repository.

    • createLease

      com.crs.entity.Lease createLease(int customerID, int carID, Date startDate, Date endDate) throws com.crs.exception.LeaseNotFoundException, com.crs.exception.CarNotFoundException, com.crs.exception.CustomerNotFoundException
      Creates a new lease for a specified customer and car with given start and end dates.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID of the customer.
      carID - The ID of the car.
      startDate - The start date of the lease.
      endDate - The end date of the lease.
      Returns:
      The created lease.
      Throws:
      com.crs.exception.LeaseNotFoundException
      com.crs.exception.CarNotFoundException
      com.crs.exception.CustomerNotFoundException

      com.crs.entity.Lease returnCar(int leaseID) throws com.crs.exception.LeaseNotFoundException, com.crs.exception.CarNotFoundException, com.crs.exception.CustomerNotFoundException
      Marks a lease as returned based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      leaseID - The ID of the lease to be marked as returned.
      Returns:
      The returned lease.
      Throws:
      com.crs.exception.LeaseNotFoundException - If the specified lease ID is not found in the repository.
